channel.title: Abu Dhabi on
channel.description: Recent content in Abu Dhabi on

item.title: Replica of the Louvre in Abu Dhabi
item.description:
Another pencil made entirely of lead. Like the previous one in my collection from the Pompidou Museum, this one had a broken writing tip, they are so fragile.

Incidentally, the Louvre in Abu Dhabi is a museum opened with France, for thirty years they have secured the name, support and collections of the original Louvre. Apparently with lead pencils too.
